TEXT.TITLE: NASD STARTS SEARCH FOR NEW PRESIDENT
TEXT.BODY: The <National Association of Securities Dealers Inc> said it has named a search committee to seek a replacement for outgoing president Gordon S. Macklin, who recently announced plans to become chairman of <Hambrecht and Quist>. Reuter
